anchor.png.name: Anchor
anchor.png.description: This can stop the airships from moving.

hammer.png.name: Hammer
hammer.png.description: Used to break rocks on the Map Screen.

jugems_cloud.png.name: Jugem's Cloud
jugems_cloud.png.description: Allows you to pass an action scene without playing it.

music_box.png.name: Music Box
music_box.png.description: You can make Hammer Brothers and others fall asleep on the map.

p-wing.png.name: Magic Wing
p-wing.png.description: You can fly through an action scene until you run into an enemy.

star.png.name: Starman
star.png.description: When you start an action scene you will be invincible for a short time.

warp_whistle.png.name: Warp Whistle
warp_whistle.png.description: Not much is known about the Magic Whistle. See if you can find it!
